name: Red Pants (Zomorro Studio)
description:
Red Pants is a tiny fairy tale creature and he needs your help to move. His house lies on his hungry snail companion. Guide the snail avoiding strange threats from the forest. You will have to use your head, or maybe the lettuce that is on your head!

This game was made for Global Game Jam 2019.

Programmer: Iñaki Vázquez

Graphics: Ibai Aizpurua

Music: Gonzalo Sardón
